title: Security Valuation
description: The valuation of securities using fundamental and technical analysis. Topics include: DCF valuation, price multiples, free cash flow, and the construction of quantitative trading models.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3062 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3078 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
